description.value:
This thin cloak is surprisingly light, as if clouds or the very wind were woven together to make the garment. The cloak grants you a +3 item bonus to Acrobatics checks. When you invest the cloak, you either increase your Dexterity modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value.

Activateâ€”Ride the Wind 1 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You tug on the cloak, wrapping yourself in the power of wind. You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour. While wrapped in the cloak, you become translucent, causing you to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] for the duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Cloak of Swiftness]
